name: Gravity Golfer
description:
Get to the goal of this non-traditional golf game by changing the way that gravity affects the golf ball! Navigate through different environments and come up with creative solutions that will test your knowledge of Sir Isaac Newtons' most famous law! Experiment with the different mechanics, and have fun toying with the elements in Gravity Golfer's levels!

Created for "My first Game Jam" 2020 -- Still in development.
